title: Blood microbial signatures associated with mortality in patients with sepsis: A pilot study
content:

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 8

Author(s): Huarong Chen, Weixin Liu, Olabisi Oluwabukola Coker, Na Qin, Hongyan Chen, Yifei Wang, Xiaodong Liu, Lin Zhang, Gordon Y.S. Choi, Wai Tat Wong, Czarina C.H. Leung, Lowell Ling, Mamie Hui, Tony Gin, Sunny Hei Wong, Matthew Tak Vai Chan, William Ka Kei Wu
